name: CONSENT_RISK_TXT
description: This table contains risk and complication documentation for consent document (DCS) records.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CONSENT_RISK_TXT
columns.description: Stores surgical risk and complication information for a document in free text to be used on consent document.
